titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit the use of proceeds of tax exempt private activity bonds for community and water facility loans guaranteed under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/26/2003--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the use of proceeds of tax exempt private activity bonds for community and water facility loans guaranteed under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.
